    • Method Detail

      • runGame

        public static void runGame()

      • switchPlayer

        public static void switchPlayer()
        Cycles through the players involved by storing specified player's points, counting score, resetting the static variable and then increasing the baton for the next player. If the baton is the last one then it goes back to the first, a new round starts and if three rounds are played it displays who won.

      • playerSetup

        public static void playerSetup(int numOfPlayers)

      • checkWinner

        public static void checkWinner()
        stores each player's total score in an array, sorts it, then checks the last position with each player's (ascending order in the sorted). The last one in it is the winner.

      • getDice

        public static void getDice()

      • useLock

        public static void useLock(int LockOnDiceNr)
        Parameters:
        LockOnDiceNr - locks specified die.

      • unlockAll

        public static void unlockAll()

      • chance

        public static void chance()
        stores every die's value and puts lowerPoint to the total value.

      • checkNrOfPairs

        public static void checkNrOfPairs(int whatCombo)
        goes through each die value possible, counts the occurence, if there are two, multiply value by two, store it and output correct message, same goes for four.
        Parameters:
        whatCombo - sets which one to utilize when clicking on specific row.

      • countOccurence

        public static int countOccurence(int nr)
        Parameters:
        nr - the value to be checked.
        Returns:
        the number of times checked value occured.

      • trissCheck

        public static void trissCheck()
        goes through, checks if the occurence is three, if so, three of a kind.

      • houseCheck

        public static void houseCheck(int HouseorTriss)
        goes through all of them, checks occurence, if twice, multiply by two, check again if another value occurs three times, if both hold true you have House, otherwise three of a kind. If the second check gives two, you have two pair.
        Parameters:
        HouseorTriss - specifies which one's to be utilized when clicked on specific row in table.

      • straightCheck

        public static void straightCheck(int whichStraight)
        gathers each die, stores their value in array, sorts it, and compares it to two different arrays, if it matches the former, it's a small straight, if it's the other it's a big straight.
        Parameters:
        whichStraight - sets which straight to be utilized when specified row in table is clicked.

      • fiveOfAKind

        public static void fiveOfAKind()
        looks at the first die in the array, goes through the rest to see if they match the first one. If there are five matches, you have Yatzy.

      • onesSixCheck

        public static void onesSixCheck()
        Check a specific die value and multiply by its occurence in the hand, add points to pointSum.
